dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5029 IH: To amend the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to require the specialty crops committee to make an additional recommendation regarding agricultural technology, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Soto introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to require the specialty crops committee to make an additional recommendation regarding agricultural technology, and for other purposes.

section.header: Additional recommendation of specialty crops committee regarding use of agricultural technology

subsection.text: Section 1408A(c)(2) of the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3123a(c)(2)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (G), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (H), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: increase the use of agricultural technology, including sensor and imaging technology.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to reports submitted on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
